â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Available commands:
/shop buy <item> <amount> - Buy item
/shop sell <item> <amount> - Sell item
/shop prices - Show all prices
/shop info <item> - Item info

Example: /shop buy diamond 10

message.parts.no_body_for_tank_container: This body doesn't support tank containers
message.blocks_on_top: No space. Please remove blocks above
message.key_no_vehicle: This key does not belong to a Vehicle
tooltip.repair_kit: Only repairs your vehicle when it has more than 90%% damage
tooltip.battery: Restores the energy of your vehicle battery in the vehicle GUI
description.canister: Sneak + right-click a Fuel Station to fill the Canister with Fuel. Place it in the fuel slot of your vehicle to restore some fuel. It should only be used to be able to get to the next Fuel Station.
description.fuel_station: A Fuel Station can be used to fuel Vehicles and Canisters. It has an internal fluid storage of 16,000 mb. To fuel a Vehicle drive it directly in front of the Fuel Station. To fill a Canister sneak and right click the Fuel Station with the Canister in your hand.
description.fuel_station_admin: You can set a price to pay for fueling. Sneak + right-click the Fuel Station with an empty hand to open the admin GUI. You can only access the admin GUI if you placed the Fuel Station or you are server operator.
description.repair_kit: With the Repair Kit you can repair your Vehicle in the vehicle GUI. NOTE: This only repairs the vehicle when the damage is greater than 90%. It should only be used to be able to get to the next Vehicle Workshop.
description.tank: A Tank can be used to store fluids. It stores 16,000 mb. It can hold every known fluid.
description.battery: With the Battery you can refill your vehicle's energy in the vehicle GUI. A full Battery restores 500 energy. You can recharge it by sneak + right clicking a generator.
description.container: Adds more inventory space to your transporter
description.tank_container: Adds the ability to store fluids inside your transporter
description.license_plate: You can set the name by right-clicking this item. To apply it to the vehicle sneak and right-click the vehicle with it. The vehicle has to have a License Plate Holder to do this.
death.attack.hit_vehicle: %s was run over by a vehicle
